blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

but it’s meant to be positive I swear
summary: I honestly don’t even wanna be in the fucking phandom anymore
question: I honestly don’t even wanna be in the fucking phandom anymore
answer: Then don’t! You can like things without associating yourself with the crazier parts of the fan base! It’s super easy to enjoy Dan and Phil’s content without being part of “The Phandom”

summary: ive seen a couple people saying that ii is dan and phils last ever world tour, they say they said it in a live show but ive seen...
question: ive seen a couple people saying that ii is dan and phils last ever world tour, they say they said it in a live show but ive seen all of them and havent heard them say that??
answer:
I’m fairly certain this isn’t a completely accurate statement. From what I remember, Dan and Phil said before they left on tour that this could be there last world tour, so come see them if you want to see them. I’m pretty sure that was their way of saying they can’t know that anyone will definitely sponsor them for a third tour (as, even if the two of them do have money, going around the world and booking venues etc etc isn’t something you can easily pay out of pocket on the drop of a dime). 

It might have also been their way of saying that they don’t have a current idea for another tour show. 

Remember that the majority of the phandom were under the impression that Dan and Phil wouldn’t go on tour again after TATINOF as well, because they similarly warned us they may not do it again. My personal belief is not that they say those things to make sure people come to this show (cause believe me, people are going to go anyway and they know it) but because they don’t want to be responsible for suggesting they might go again, and then they end up unable to do so. 

Anyway, another reason I think people think this might be their last tour is because in the first few II shows, Dan and Phil mentioned that after this tour, they both have other projects they want to pursue which may or may not involve each other. The phandom as a collective sort of panicked and worried this might mean they were separating, or that they were quitting youtube. I think they just meant they want to potentially do more BBC things, or, in the case of Dan, do more work with stuff like Young Minds and the gaming documentary he did that one time. 

Of course, I could be totally wrong and Dan and Phil did say this was their last tour, but I’d really like a receipt for this and not just word of mouth. As far as I’m concerned, none of us, including Dan and Phil, really know what the future holds
